Text: i can't download this, why is it so huge?

Actually it is not really that big, This is actually small for a High Def video. But since you were wondering, that is the reason why, It has a resolution of 1280x720 using the x.264 library to encode an H264 video. Most videos you probably download use a much lower resolution closer to 450x350(est.) even though they came from a HD source they are compressed to save space.

Also if you do not have a fast computer and/or newer videocard that supports hardware acceleration you may not be able to play this video smoothly. but if you do you will need to download Media Player Classic - Home Cinema edition to play it. There are other options but IMO this is the best way to play these videos with hardware acceleration.

http://mpc-hc.sourceforge.net/

And check here for setting up Hardware Acceleration:  http://mpc-hc.sourceforge.net/DXVASupport.html
thanx hardcore, i understand why it's a larger file. i just want the lower res one which they usually put out.
when i said that i couldn't download this, what i meant was that i didn't want to.
but i appreciate ur helpfulness. ur a good person.
I appreciate these large file (HQ) videos. Tanks
